attributes.action: Stop lorries overtaking on motorways, keep in single lanes.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This will allow a more continued traffic flow. Reduces accidents. Stops blocking faster moving transport.  Stops all lanes used for overtaking by lorries.  Truck A at 55mph, with truck B at 58mph trying to overtake. Example M62, three of the four lanes used to overtake each other resulting in tale backs.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
